name: 200Apps
description:
We design and build beautiful mobile applications. Every character written in our code, is written with a thought of providing the best user experience possible. We live and breathe our projects — from a mobile application for a small startup  to enterprise-level platforms.
We don't just make apps!
We offer an array of services that are unique to each project and each client's needs. Our team will walk you through the research and planning of your project all the way to the completion and launch of the finished product – and even after that. 
TL;DR We’re great!
